title: Peter Weber on Night One and His ‘Biggest Fear’
description:
Bachelor Peter Weber sits down with Rachel Lindsay and new co-host Becca Kufrin about his first night handing out the roses. He discusses why Hannah Ann received the First Impression Rose, how he felt about Hannah Brown’s cameo, and his “biggest fear” about being the Bachelor.

Plus, Peter reveals how he really felt about Hannah Brown revealing the intimate details from their night in the Fantasy Suite.

Don’t forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.
